text: It was great staying in pune. I will recommend to my my friends if they are travelling to pune. and the surrounding having great restaurant and good place to explore. thank you Mr. santy for being the host
author: Noel

text: If you're looking for a real homely homestay in Pune, this is the place to be in. It is a bunglow on a quaint road, surrounded by societies. Mr. Santy stays on the ground floor and he makes you feel at home, without any interference. My mom is a tea lover and he let us use the kitchen to our liking. I was skeptic about the safery before I booked the place as 4 of us were females, but it is absolutely a safe & secure environment/locality for women.
author: Shrutika
